item.title: [Python] Converts the financial information of all listed companies over the past 5 years into a CSV file
item.description: ## Introduction In the previous article, I wrote about how to obtain financial statement information from XBRL format data obtained from the EDINET of the Financial Services Agency. Get information on the financial statements of listed companies from XBRL. After that, EDINET released a web API called EDINET API, which made it possible to automatically download XBRL files. This time, I downloaded a XBRL file of all listed companies for the past 5 years and created a program to convert it into a CSV file.
